description:
A new soldier appears for World three, the Yoga Soldier AKA Mahajarama. A new netbattler is introduced shortly after, using a standard net navi but disappears right after the battle.
During the Mahajarama`s show which is supposed to show people a new yoga technique just for net battles, a net navi called Magicman hypnotised the viewers to become animals. With such a large viewer ratio (95%) this devistates the city.
It`s up to Netto to stop Magicman. As Rockman reaches the station a different transmission comes through with amazing speed. Magicman admits that his controller is the yoga master. Rockman has trouble with Magicman`s viruses when a mysterious Navi appears who saves Rockman.
The mysterious net battler greet Netto and Rockman as Ijuin Enzan and tells him not to disappoint him or Blues, his net navi.

titles.title: นักรบโยคะผู้น่าสะพรึงกลัว!
